resources.string: Streaming audio and video music just became a lot more fun!
Discover easily thousands of music across all genre.Listen to the music of your choice and Cheer your favourite artist
Easily search videos music of your favourite artist, watch and download
Manage font size of RSS feeds
If disabled, feeds won\'t animate, this might reduce lag
If enabled, feeds will animate, this might generate lag
If disabled, sources won\'t animate, this might reduce lag
If enabled, sources will animate, this might generate lag
If disabled, you won\'t see a circular reveal animation on add sources screen
If enabled, you will see a circular reveal animation on add sources screen
Import some of the best Rss feed sources available over the internet
Submit your own Rss feed sources and help in improving the current curated list
If disabled, application will open feed links via standard browser
If enabled, application will open feed links via in-app browser(requires chrome v45+)
Import custom feed sources from Opml files, either from a url or a file
If disabled, application will not store the feeds downloaded in the database
If enabled, application will store the feeds downloaded in the database
Restore the database to its initial state
This will remove all the values from the database. This incudes deleting your sources, archives and feeds.
Not every Rss source will work correctly with the app, so inorder to make it work you need to modify your feeds. Tap here to view the tutorial

Version 0.41

Minor bug fixes.

Version 0.40

Added sync feature. Now you can synchronize feeds in background and application will save all of the data for offline reading.

Version 0.33

Added white icons in dark theme(only in category list and sources list) so they are easier to see.

Removed shadow from toolbars as it was glitching in dark theme.

Version 0.32

Minor bug fixes.

Added shadow to toolbars.

Added option to delete the feed from article.

Version 0.31

Minor bug fix, which was making the settings menu crash on some devices.

Version 0.30

Added Opml integration.

Added Read External Storage permission so that user can import opml feeds via file stored in SD Card or internal storage.

Added Curated feeds and option to submit your own feeds to the curated list.

Added Sorting option, now user can sort the feeds by random, title, category and date.

Minor bug fixes.

Version 0.22

Made circular reveal animation optional, you can disable it in settings.

Version 0.21

Fixed a bug in which white screen was shown on splash screen.

Added the option to rate, view source code and view licence in About screen.

Version 0.20

Added dark theme.

Version 0.11

Removed duplicate entries in settings menu.

Version 0.10

Released initial version.
